get.description: Get Backing Tracks for a song by title

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: slug value for song or lesson title

200.description: Returns a list of backing track titles and URLs

post.description: Gets a presigned URL for uploading backing tracks to S3

200.description: Returns an object containing a valid backing track upload URL

get.description: Get songs by searching or IDs

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: max number of results to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: offset of the first item in the response

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: comma-delimited list of ids to retrieve

get.description: Get a song by its ID

put.description: Direct file upload to s3 for the tablature name specified at the end of the url path

start-at.description: time to make item publicly available

end-at.description: time to remove item from being publicly available

upload_url.description: the S3 URL to upload the file to

total.description: total number of results matching request critiera

count.description: number of results in the response

capo-fret.description: the fret the capo is on

filename.description: the name of the file to be uploaded
